plot: Friendships fall apart between a group of bohemian artists in Paris with the arrival of Shuko, visiting from Japan.
title: Paris Skylight
plot_es: Friendships fall apart between a group of bohemian artists in Paris with the arrival of Shuko, visiting from Japan.
plot_en: Friendships fall apart between a group of bohemian artists in Paris with the arrival of Shuko, visiting from Japan.
